price: 17਼ ਉਹ ਰਾਤਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਬਹੁਤ ਹੀ ਘੱਟ ਸੌਂਦੇ ਸਨ।
arabic: كَانُواْ قَلِيلٗا مِّنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: kānū qalīlan mina al-layli mā yahjaʿūna
